column2: VERMONT PERMIT PRACTICE TEST
Question Text
1. A red traffic sign means?
2. What happens if two vehicles reach at the same time an intersection with four-way stop signs?
column4: The driver on the right yields to the driver on the left.
column6: The driver on the left yields to the driver on the right.
column8: The first vehicle to reach the intersection must yield.

column2: 3. Most signs used in street work areas are:
4. Drivers should __________ share the lane with a motorcycle.
5. Drivers should be aware that a motorcyclist may:
column4: quickly change speed or lane position.
column6: move to the center of the lane on steel deck bridges.
column8: decrease speed and rise off the seat when approaching a railroad crossing.

column2: 6. Work zone signs:
column4: mean that road conditions will improve soon.
column6: mean that drivers must come to a complete stop and back up.
column8: mean that drivers should drive faster to get out of the work zone.
column10: provide information on road work or other temporary road conditions.

column2: 7. This sign tells drivers that:
column4: they must not make a right turn.
column6: they must make a left turn at the intersection.

column2: 8. While driving, it is important to slow down:
9. Roads are most slippery:
column8: when it first starts to rain.

column2: 10. When a driver is turning and a pedestrian is crossing without a traffic light, __________ must yield the right-of-way.
11. A thumping sound can be a warning:
column4: that a tire blowout is about to occur.

column2: 12. What does a flashing red light mean?
column4: Drivers may move forward with caution.
column10: The same thing as a stop sign.

column2: 13. Tailgating:
column6: cannot result in a traffic citation.
column8: can frustrate other drivers and make them angry.

column2: 14. Where there is no bicycle lane, where on the road must a bicyclist ride?
column4: on the left shoulder of the road.
column6: near the left edge of the road.
column8: near the right curb or edge of the road.

column2: 15. Braking distance is affected by:
column4: the speed your vehicle is traveling.
column6: the condition of your brakes and tires.

column2: 16. This road sign means:
17. Arrows on the roadway:
column8: show which lanes you must use.
column10: indicate that you can not pass or change lanes.

column2: 18. Two motorcyclists are allowed to:
column4: ride side-by-side in a single lane.
column8: exceed the posted speed limit when driving on expressways.
column10: share the lane with another vehicle.

column2: 19. Which sign has white letters on a red background?
20. When they see a yellow X signal, drivers should:
column4: prepare to leave the lane safely.
column8: come to a complete stop at the marked stop line.
